DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize subject CYP2D6*10 allele may lower steady state level endoxifen due reduce conversion tamoxifen endoxifen . Primary objective : - To determine steady state pharmacokinetics tamoxifen metabolites - To test effect genetic polymorphism CYP2D6 plasma concentration tamoxifen metabolites hormone receptor positive woman take tamoxifen adjuvant treatment breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Tamoxifen Pharmacokinetics CYP2D6 Polymorphisms Asian Women With Hormone Receptor Positive Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent . At least 18 year age . On tamoxifen least 3 month adjuvant therapy . On stable diet past 1 week blood sampling . Compliant tamoxifen medication . Completed adjuvant chemotherapy and/or adjuvant radiation therapy . â€¢ Patients list medication last 1 week accrual study
